resources.string: Hey! I found this free app for taking screenshots without letting them know.\nDownload here\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=
Tap record button to start taking screen shots

1. Create Notification View by clicking the 'Create Notification' button above. 
 2. Click on the start button to start taking screenshots in burst mode. 
 3. Click on the stop button to stop taking screenshots. 
 4. Review all taken screenshots.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

Released on September 11, 2022 \nWe, Screen Capture, regards your information significant and release this Privacy Policy to inform you what information we collect and how we use it to personalize and continually improve you experience. This Privacy Policy applies to Screen Capture app (hereinafter App), which is available by following URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.screencapture.android

We do not collect Personal Information. Personal Information is information that identifies you or another person, such as your first name and last name, physical addresses, email addresses, telephone, fax, SSN, information stored within your device.
We collect your non-personal information when you use our App, including your information about device, operating system, such as screen resolution, amount of RAM and model of CPU.
We may collect your information when you communicate or give us.
We do not store Personal Information,therefore we do not disclose your Personal Information.

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your information. We do not combine Non-Personal Information with Personal Information (such as combining your name with your unique User Device number).

We will access, use or disclose your information with other organizations or entities for reasons that required by any applicable law, regulation, legal process or enforceable governmental request; detect, prevent, or otherwise fraud, security or technical issues; protect against harm to the rights, property or safety of ScreenCapture, our users or the public as required or permitted by law.

Screen Capture is very concerned about safeguarding the confidentiality of your information. We do not collect Personal Information, and we employ administrative, physical and electronic measures designed to protect your Non-Personal Information from unauthorized access and use. Please be aware that no security measures that we take to protect your information is absolutely guaranteed to avoid unauthorized access or use of your Non-Personal Information which is impenetrable. Sensitive Information We ask that you not send us, and you not disclose, any sensitive Personal Information (e.g., information related to racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religion or other beliefs, health, sexual orientation, criminal background or membership in past organizations, including trade union memberships) on or through the App or otherwise to us.

1.The App does not contain pictures or sounds likely to be scary or horrifying.
2.The App does not contain inferences of, references to, or depictions of sexuality, sexual violence, suggestiveness, provocative attire, or nudity.
3.The App does not contain simulations of betting or gambling that is normally played/carried out in casinos, gambling halls, or racetracks.
4.The App does not contain any potentially offensive language.
5.The App does not contain any reference to or use of drugs, alcohol, or tobacco.
6.The App does not contain any bodily functions such as belching, flatulence, or vomiting when used for humorous purposes.
7.The App does not allow users of this App interact or exchange content with other users.
8.The App does not share user-provided personal information with third parties.
9.The App does not share the user's current physical location to other users.
10.The App does not allow users to purchase digital goods.
11.The App does not contain any Nazi symbols, references, or propaganda.
12.The App does not contain detailed descriptions of techniques that could be used in criminal offenses.
13.The App does not advocate committing acts of terrorism.
14.All of the items above does not refer to user generated content.
If you have any questions or comments about this Policy or our privacy practices, or to report any violations of the Policy or abuse of the App, please contact us at tehmooramjad175@gmail.com

Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time. We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your explicit consent. We will post any privacy policy changes on this page, so please review it periodically. If you do not agree to any modifications to this Policy, you could immediately stop all use of the App. We will also keep prior versions of this Privacy Policy in an archive for your review.
